author: fioriNTU
body:
Cooked again possible Pix and Strip clients for XeXe, in this version the run key used in DQM has no effect at all. We simply read the right RAW data collection and after Digis we use the plain pp reconstruction
Basically a second version of #20855

Also these clients do not give a crash in the test run we have.
title: Second attempt for special Pix and Strip clients for XeXe
